title: Mummy1.0
body: Shhh, Jim, keep your head down. [[Answer:Player1.1|Player1.1a]] [[Answer:Player1.2a|Player1.2a]]

title: Player1.1a
body: Why are you hiding in the park? [[Answer:Mummy1.1b|Mummy1.1b]]

title: Player1.2a
body: Sorry, do I know you? [[Answer:Mummy1.2b|Mummy1.2b]]

title: Mummy1.1b
body: I'm hiding, man! I'm scared![[Answer:Mummy1.2e|Mummy1.2e]]

title: Mummy1.2b
body: Russell Ulysses Mye Mummy, pleased to meet you. [[Answer:Player1.2cI|Player1.2cI]] [[Answer:Player1.2cII|Player1.2cII]]

title: Player1.2cI
body: *shakes hand* [[Answer:Mummy1.2d|Mummy1.2d]]

title: Player1.2cII
body: I think I recognize you from around town. [[Answer:Mummy1.2d|Mummy1.2d]]

title: Mummy1.2d
body: Yes, you may have seen me around the Wolfington estate. I was brought on as au pair of sorts. Lovely family. [[Answer:Node|Mummy1.2e]]

title: Mummy1.2e
body: Say, how well do you know ol' Lloyd? [[Answer:Player2.2a|Player2.2a]] [[Answer:Player2.1a|Player2.1a]]

title: Player2.1a
body: <reqVar>hateBoss 1</reqVar>He's already threatened me with death by lawsuit. We're familiar. [[Answer:Mummy2.1b|Mummy2.1b]]

title: Player2.2a
body: Not well personally, though I can't say I'm a fan of his lease rates for my office. [[Answer:Mummy2.2b|Mummy3.0a]]

title: Mummy3.0a
body: Yes, and his son's are about as nice as well. [[Answer:Player3.1a|Player3.1a]] [[Answer:Player3.2a|Player3.2a]]

title: Player3.1a
body: Luana Pine is cheating on Jon Wolfington. [[Answer:Player3.1b|Player3.1b]]<clue>Luana Pine is cheating on Jon Wolfington</clue>

title: Player3.1b
body: Clearly his last name wasn't the only thing of his she didn't want. [[Answer:Mummy3.1c|Mummy3.1c]]

title: Player3.2a
body: Eh, Don was pretty handy in fixing my AC last summer. [[Answer:Mummy3.2b|MummyEnd3.2b]]

title: MummyEnd3.2b
body: Yes, he's very helpful that way...

title: Mummy3.1c
body: Funny how John Doe should come up... [[Answer:Mummy4.0a|Mummy4.0a]]

title: Mummy2.1b
body: Yes, well Lloyd is a dickhead, there's no two ways about it. But Jon killed a man tonight. <clue>Jon is the killer?</clue> [[Answer:Mummy4.0a|Mummy4.0a]]

title: Mummy4.0a
body: *[i]deep breath[/i]* Ok. Here goes. [[Answer:Mummy4.0b|Mummy4.0b]]

title: Mummy4.0b
body: Jon Wolfington murdered John Doe tonight. [[Answer:Player4.1a|Player4.1a]] [[Answer:Player4.2a|Player4.2a]]

title: Player4.1a
body: I'm guessing this is why you're hiding in the park. [[Answer:Player5.0a|Player5.0a]]

title: Player4.2a
body: To hell with his father. He's going down. [[Answer:Player5.0a|Player5.0a]]

title: Player5.0a
body: But can you prove it? [[Answer:Mummy5.0b|Mummy5.0b]]

title: Mummy5.0b
body: Of course! I was cleaning Jon's room, when I found a business card for the John Doe travel agency.  [[Answer:Mummy5.0c|Mummy5.0c]]

title: Mummy5.0c
body: ...next to a used condom and a puddle of blood. [[Answer:Mummy5.0d|Mummy5.1a]]

title: Mummy5.1a
body: Luckily I had my camera on me. And thank goodness it was a Polaroid!™ [[Answer:Node|Mummy5.1b]]<cngVar>test 01</cngVar>

title: Mummy5.1b
body: Thanks to Polaroid™'s <color=lime>I</color><color=purple>n</color><color=aqua>s</color><color=blue>t</color><color=orange>a</color><color=darkblue>n</color><color=teal>t</color><color=magenta>C</color><color=green>o</color><color=purple>l</color><color=navy>o</color><color=aqua>r</color><color=red>™</color> technology, I developed the incriminating photos instantly! [[Answer:Player5.1a|Player5.1a]] [[Answer:Player5.2a|Player5.2a]]

title: Player5.1a
body: Is everyone around here a paid spokesman today? Did I miss a newsletter? [[Answer:Mummy6.0|Mummy6.0a]]

title: Player5.2a
body: Great! Can I have it?<reqVar>test 0</reqVar> [[Answer:Mummy6.0|Mummy6.0a]]

title: Mummy6.0a
body: Of course! You too can get this great Polaroid™. [[Answer:Mummy6.0b|Mummy6.0b]]

title: Mummy6.0b
body: Just find it where I dropped it in the bushes, while I was running around their lawn... [[Answer:Player6.1a|Player6.1a]] [[Answer:Player6.2a|Player6.2a]]

title: Player6.1a
body: You dropped it?! [[Answer:Mummy6.2a|Mummy6.2a]]

title: Player6.2a
body: Ugh. Fine. Where do you think it is? [[Answer:Mummy6.2a|Mummy6.2a]]

title: Mummy6.2a
body: At least I remembered [i]where[/i] I dropped it, right? [[Answer:Mummy6.2b|Mummy6.2b]]

title: Mummy6.2b
body: Next to that dead bush. Definitely next to a dead bush. [[Answer:Player6.3a|Player6.3a]]  [[Answer:Player6.4a|Player6.4a]]

title: Player6.3a
body: Can you remember anything else? Maybe something more specific? [[Answer:Node|Mummy7.0a]]

title: Player6.4a
body: Ugh. You're useless [[Answer:Mummy6.4a|Mummy6.4a]]

title: Mummy6.4a
body: Wow. Rude. Thanks. [[Answer:player6.4aEnd|player6.4aEnd]] [[Answer:Player6.4b|Player6.4b]]

title: player6.4aEnd
body: Get over it. The world is tough, and so am I. It puts criminals away. [[Answer:Mummy6.4bEnd|Mummy6.4bEnd]]

title: Mummy6.4bEnd
body: I was planning on giving you this house key. But how about, instead, you take it and shove it up your dick hole. Fuck off.

title: Player6.4b
body: Look, Russ. Can I call you Russ? [[Answer:Player6.4c|Player6.4c]]

title: Player6.4c
body: Russ, I'm sorry. I've got the lawsuit of Damocles hanging over my head. [[Answer:Player6.4d|Player6.4d]]

title: Player6.4d
body: Plus, a bank account in the tens of dollars. [[Answer:Mummy6.4e|Mummy6.4e]]

title: Mummy6.4e
body: Ok, I think I remember exactly where I dropped it. [[Answer:Node|Mummy7.0a]]

title: Mummy7.0a
body: I think it's in the bush where I hopped their wall. Near Garbon Street. Inside the property. [[Answer:Node|Mummy7.0b]]<clue>The evidence is in the Wolfington Estate</clue>

title: Mummy7.0b
body: You'll need a key. Here. Take mine.<cngVar>hasKey 100</cngVar> [[Answer:Player7.0End|Player7.0End]]<clue>Near the dead bush, by Garbon St.</clue>

title: Player7.0End
body: You're a hero to your community.
